attributes.action: Reject petitions with spelling or grammar errors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The creation of a petition should, at least, require correct spelling. A bit of thought and preparation isn't beyond anyone. Without this the whole process is devalued.... I cant understand some petitions displayed here, how can I support such rubbish?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
